section_title: 32b01a            Hourly rate employees paid semimonthly or monthly.
text:
It
is permissible under the FLSA OT requirements for hourly rate employees to
receive semimonthly or monthly payments which include OT premium if the
requirements as described in FOH 32j11 are met.
html: It is permissible under the FLSA OT requirements for hourly rate employees to receive semimonthly or monthly payments which include OT premium if the requirements as described in FOH 32j11 are met.
